___location.description: Required. Gets or sets the location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The geo region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geo region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

___name.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

$eref.description: Identity for the resource.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used for viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key with a length no greater than 128 characters and a value with a length no greater than 256 characters.

$eref.description: The parameters used to create the storage account.

___customDomain.description: User domain assigned to the storage account. Name is the CNAME source. Only one custom domain is supported per storage account at this time. To clear the existing custom domain, use an empty string for the custom domain name property.

___encryption.description: Provides the encryption settings on the account. If left unspecified the account encryption settings will remain the same. The default setting is unencrypted.

___isHnsEnabled.description: Account HierarchicalNamespace enabled if sets to true.

___azureFilesAadIntegration.description: Enables Azure Files AAD Integration for SMB if sets to true.

___accessTier.description: Required for storage accounts where kind = BlobStorage. The access tier used for billing.

___supportsHttpsTrafficOnly.description: Allows https traffic only to storage service if sets to true.

___properties.description: The parameters used to create the storage account.

$eref.description: The restriction because of which SKU cannot be used.

___reasonCode.description: The reason for the restriction. As of now this can be "QuotaId" or "NotAvailableForSubscription". Quota Id is set when the SKU has requiredQuotas parameter as the subscription does not belong to that quota. The "NotAvailableForSubscription" is related to capacity at DC.
